data.nrql: SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01',WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') TIMESERIES 3 hours WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'

SELECT min(cpuPercent) AS `MIN CPU(%)`,max(cpuPercent) AS `MAX CPU(%)`,average(cpuPercent) AS `AVG CPU(%)` FROM SystemSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01',WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') limit 400 WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'

SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) FROM SystemSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01',WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') TIMESERIES 3 hours WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'

SELECT min(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) AS `MIN Memory(%)`,max(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) AS `MAX Memory(%)`, average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) AS `AVG Memory(%)` FROM SystemSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' ,WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') limit 400 WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'

SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) FROM StorageSample TIMESERIES 3 hours facet `hostname`,`mountPoint` where (hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' or hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') and (`mountPoint`='/' or `mountPoint`='/boot') SINCE 1 months ago

SELECT min(diskUsedPercent) AS 'MIN DISK USAGE', max(diskUsedPercent) AS 'MAX DISK USAGE', average(diskUsedPercent) AS 'AVG DISK USAGE' FROM StorageSample FACET `hostname`,`mountPoint` where (hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' or hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') and (`mountPoint`='/' or `mountPoint`='/boot')  SINCE 1 months ago

SELECT average(receiveBytesPerSecond) FROM NetworkSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01',WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') TIMESERIES 3 hours WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'

SELECT min(receiveBytesPerSecond) AS `MIN INBOUND`,max(receiveBytesPerSecond) AS `MAX inbound`,average(receiveBytesPerSecond) AS `AVG Inbound` FROM NetworkSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01',WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02')  WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'

SELECT average(transmitBytesPerSecond) FROM NetworkSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01',WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') TIMESERIES 3 hours WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'

SELECT min(transmitBytesPerSecond) AS `MIN OutBound`,max(transmitBytesPerSecond) AS `MAX OutBound`,average(transmitBytesPerSecond) AS `AVG OutBound` FROM NetworkSample since 1 months ago facet cases(WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB01' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB01',WHERE hostname='ESOF-PROD2-WEB02' as 'ESOF-PROD2-WEB02') limit 400 WITH TIMEZONE 'Asia/Seoul'
